message: I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this product. I think you'll really love it!
I appreciate the offer, Alice, but $16,000 is a bit too high for me. I'm interested in the product, but I can only go up to $12,000 at this time.
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. I can meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about we say $14,000?
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $14,000 is still a bit high for me. I'm really interested in this product, and I'm willing to go up to $13,000. What do you think?
I'm glad you're serious about the product, Bob. I can see you're willing to make a deal. Let's try to meet in the middle again. How about we say $13,500?
Alice, I understand you need to make a profit, but $13,500 is still a bit too much for me.  I'm willing to go up to $13,000, and I really hope we can come to an agreement.  What do you say?

I'm starting to think we're close, Bob. I can see you're really interested in the product. Let's try to meet you at $13,250. That way, I can still make a profit, and you can get the product for a good price.
Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but $13,250 is still a bit above my target.  I'm willing to go up to $12,750. This is my final offer. Let's see if we can close this deal.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm starting to think you're not serious about the product. I'm willing to meet you at $13,000, but that's as low as I can go. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to explore other options.
